steps.description: Pour-Pour 1 egg into the ramekin cup
Microwave-Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on high for 30 seconds
steps.modified_description: Microwave-Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on medium for 60 seconds

steps.description: Coat -Coat a 6-oz. ramekin cup with cooking spray
steps.modified_description: Put some oil into a 6-oz. ramekin cup

errors.description: cooking spray instead of regular oil

steps.description: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with a knife
steps.modified_description: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with hands

steps.description: Line -Line the bottom piece of the English muffin with lettuce
Microwave -Continue to Microwave for 15-30 more seconds or until the egg is almost set
Top -Top cup with 1 tablespoon of salsa
steps.modified_description: Top -Top cup with 2 tablespoon of salsa

steps.description: sprinkle -sprinkle 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup
Microwave -Microwave just until cheese melts, about 10 seconds
Place -Place the egg from the cup over the lettuce
steps.modified_description: Place -Place the egg from the cup under the lettuce

steps.description: replace -replace the top of the English muffin
